title: Pi 360 Institute Management
overview: Pi 360 is a multi-campus, data-driven educational ERP designed to bridge the gap between administration, teachers, and students. It provides a centralized 'control tower' view for management while offering personalized dashboards for individual academic tracking.
challenges: Cross-Campus Synchronization: Maintaining real-time data consistency across different physical campus locations. UI/UX Complexity: Condensing massive amounts of data (Financials, Attendance, Results) into a clean, mobile-responsive dashboard without overwhelming the user. Performance Optimization: Ensuring the 'Explore Institutions' search remains fast even when filtering through thousands of data points.
approach: Implemented a robust cloud-based infrastructure using AWS and Azure with real-time data synchronization, advanced caching with Redis, and visualization tools like D3.js and ApexCharts for intuitive data presentation.
results: Successfully migrated 10TB of legacy institutional data with zero downtime
Predictive analytics help management forecast revenue and student growth trends

title: GadgetAdda E-commerce Platform
overview: A comprehensive digital transformation of a retail electronics business. This project involved building a robust, high-traffic e-commerce engine (Ecom2) with a sophisticated admin panel to manage multi-vendor inventory, real-time order tracking, and automated customer notifications.
challenges: Dynamic Stock Syncing: Coordinating real-time inventory updates across the online store and physical warehouse to prevent overselling. Security & Fraud Prevention: Implementing secure checkout protocols and SSL encryption to protect sensitive customer payment data. Scalability: Optimizing server-side rendering to maintain fast load times during high-traffic flash sales.
approach: Deployed Next.js frontend with Node.js backend, implemented real-time inventory syncing, integrated secure SSL encryption, and optimized server-side rendering for fast load times.
results: 40% growth in monthly sales within first quarter
99.9% system uptime during peak holiday sales

title: Shobpi Multi-Vendor Marketplace
overview: Shobpi is a sophisticated multi-vendor marketplace (similar to Amazon or Daraz) designed to host thousands of independent sellers. Each vendor gets a private dashboard to manage products, orders, and earnings, while the Super Admin maintains global control over commissions and payouts.
challenges: Vendor Quality Control: Implementing automated verification systems to ensure only legitimate sellers are onboarded. Complex Logistics: Coordinating shipping when a single customer order contains items from three different vendors in different locations. Wallet & Payout Security: Ensuring precise financial auditing for thousands of sub-accounts and automated tax calculations.
approach: Built with Laravel multi-tenant architecture, WebSocket real-time notifications, AWS S3 for image hosting, and CloudFront CDN for global distribution.

title: ShoShikha Educational Initiative
overview: A comprehensive educational initiative designed to bridge the gap between academic learning and industry-standard backend development. Features a structured 4-month curriculum with Django core architecture, REST API development, and 6-month extended mentorship.
challenges: Curriculum Pacing: Designing a flow that moves students from zero experience to advanced concepts like JWT authentication and Redis workflows in 4 months. One-to-One Support: Maintaining high-quality mentorship and query resolution across both on-site and digital Discord communities. Real-World Integration: Ensuring students can successfully integrate AI tools like GitHub Copilot and Cursor into their manual coding workflows.
approach: Structured curriculum using Django and DRF, live sessions with recorded resources, Docker containerization for consistent environments, and GitHub integration for version control learning.
results: Students deploy full-scale REST API projects
Portfolio building and career guidance support

title: Import-Export Management System
overview: A comprehensive digital framework designed to manage the complexities of international trade. This project focuses on the end-to-end Import-Export lifecycleâ€”from sourcing global suppliers and managing customs documentation to tracking real-time shipments across borders.
challenges: Regulatory Compliance: Keeping pace with frequently changing trade policies, sanctions, and tax laws across different countries. Logistics Complexity: Coordinating Last-Mile Delivery and multimodal transfers (Sea to Rail to Road) without losing data continuity. Financial Risk: Managing currency volatility and ensuring secure international payments through automated banking integrations.
approach: Built with Spring Boot backend, EDI and XML data interchange standards, GPS/IoT sensors for tracking, Blockchain for documentation security, and PostgreSQL for transactional records.

title: Tour & Travel Booking Platform
overview: A modern, end-to-end digital solution designed to simplify the complexities of the travel industry. This project involves a high-performance booking engine that connects travelers with real-time inventory for flights, hotels, and local tours.
challenges: Real-time Inventory Sync: Preventing overbooking by maintaining millisecond-level synchronization with global airline and hotel databases. Payment Complexity: Integrating multi-currency payment gateways with automated conversion and secure Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) options. Peak Traffic Scalability: Managing extreme traffic surges during holiday seasons or flash sale events without system latency.
approach: Next.js frontend with React, Node.js backend, integrated GDS APIs (Amadeus, Sabre), Google Maps API integration, AWS with auto-scaling and CDN.

title: POS & ERP Solution
target: Manage 10+ Store Locations from Single Device
overview: A high-performance, SaaS-ready Point of Sale (POS) and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) solution. This project transforms traditional retail counters into digital hubs by integrating sales, inventory, accounting, and HRM into a single cloud-based dashboard.
challenges: Offline Synchronization: Ensuring that sales can be processed even during internet outages and synced back to the cloud once a connection is restored. Complex Tax/Discount Logic: Building a flexible engine that can handle flat discounts, percentage taxes, and coupon codes simultaneously at checkout. Concurrent Transaction Handling: Optimizing the database to handle hundreds of simultaneous Read/Write operations across multiple store outlets.
approach: Built with Laravel (PHP) and .NET 8 backend, Vue.js and React.js frontend, Flutter mobile app, ESC/POS printer integration, Barcode SDKs, AWS and DigitalOcean cloud infrastructure.
results: Zero discrepancies in daily cash register reports
30-40% reduction in manual data entry errors
Landed Cost Calculations and Profit/Loss Analytics automated

title: Real-time GPS Tracking System
overview: A high-performance IoT-based tracking solution designed for real-time monitoring of vehicles, assets, and personnel. The system integrates hardware GPS trackers with a robust cloud-based dashboard to provide live location updates, route history, and engine diagnostics.
challenges: Connectivity Dead Zones: Implementing Data Buffering where the device stores coordinates in internal memory when offline and syncs them automatically. Battery Optimization: Balancing the frequency of data pings (e.g., every 10 seconds) with the power consumption of the GPS hardware. Geofencing Logic: Creating high-speed spatial queries to detect instantly when a vehicle enters or exits a predefined virtual boundary.
approach: Node.js and Python (FastAPI) backend, React.js frontend with Leaflet and Mapbox integration, TimescaleDB for time-series data, MongoDB for document storage, MQTT protocol, AWS and Azure cloud services.
results: Location accuracy within 3-5 meters under clear sky conditions
Sub-second data transmission from vehicle to mobile app
20-25% fuel consumption reduction through route optimization

title: Smart Factory Automation
overview: Our Smart Factory Automation project revolutionizes traditional manufacturing by integrating industry 4.0 standards. We implemented IoT sensors and automated arms that communicate in real-time to prevent errors before they happen.
challenges: Integrating legacy machinery with modern IoT sensors. Ensuring zero-latency communication between robotic arms. Training staff to operate the new automated dashboard.
approach: Python backend, AWS IoT platform for device management, TensorFlow for predictive maintenance, Node.js for real-time communication, automated monitoring and alert systems.
results: Enhanced worker safety by automating dangerous manufacturing tasks

title: City Logistics Network
overview: Smart route planning and fleet management software designed to reduce delivery times and fuel consumption within urban areas using real-time traffic data.
challenges: Real-time GPS tracking and traffic prediction. Balancing load distribution across the delivery fleet. Reducing carbon footprint of last-mile delivery.
approach: Go backend for high performance, Google Maps API integration, RabbitMQ for message queuing, React Native for mobile fleet apps, machine learning for route optimization.
results: Delivery time reduced by 15 minutes per order
Real-time visibility enables proactive issue resolution

title: Tourist Booking Portal
overview: A feature-rich booking engine offering personalized travel itineraries, hotel bookings, and guided tour reservations with an integrated payment gateway.
challenges: Handling real-time inventory for tour operators. Secure payment processing in multiple currencies. Mobile-first responsive design for travelers.
approach: Next.js frontend with Tailwind CSS, Sanity CMS for content management, PayPal and Stripe API integration, Node.js backend, automated email confirmations and itinerary generation.
results: Increased online bookings by 40% in first two months
Simplified booking process increases conversion rates
Automated itineraries reduce manual planning workload

title: Company IT Infrastructure
overview: A complete overhaul of corporate networking, server management, and cybersecurity protocols. We moved the entire operation to a hybrid cloud model for maximum security and scalability.
challenges: Migrating 10TB of data without downtime. Setting up hardware firewalls across 3 branch offices. Implementing Zero-Trust security architecture.
approach: Cisco Networking for enterprise routing, Azure Cloud hybrid infrastructure, Docker and Kubernetes for containerization, automated backup systems, role-based access control, continuous monitoring.
